message: My turn. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's important to find an agreement quickly because the money loses value over time.
I'll compromise, 58% for me, let's settle
Alice, time is running out and we both lose if we don't agree. I'm coming down to 52%, let's close this deal now.
I'm still willing to compromise, 57% for me, don't let inflation eat our money
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a very fair 49%, take it before inflation eats up even more of your share!
